lastSummary: Refactored task create + claim routes to use ensureTaskSubscription (deduped upsert) consistently for assignees; ensured new messages notify task subscribers (excluding author + mentions). Added minimal apps/worker ESLint v9 config so workspace lint passes. Verified via pnpm -r lint and apps/web build; ran ops/proof_of_work.sh.
nextPlanned: Subscriptions + notification dedupe keys; shadcn UI + drag/drop kanban; task detail deliverables/docs; worker lease enforcement + standup; nodes UI.
